name: Featured Today
author: WPoets Team( Nilam patel )

sections.description:
Featured Today allows you to show featured articles or latest articles from a category that you select. It is very simple to use, just place the ‘featured today widget’ in the right widget area, select the category you want to display. It will show featured article in the same way as featured articles are shown on the linkedin today page.

This plugin is brought to you by WPoets development team.

Features

  • Displays as widget
  • You can set number of articles to show
  • You can select the category to use
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload featured-today folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place the ‘Featured Today Widget’ in the widgetized area defined in your templates
